about: Here is just another software developer writing another blog.
description:
I am Cheng-Yu and a full-stack software developer with experience in creating and maintaining complex web applications such as:

* Responsive interfaces (JavaScript/React)
* Cloud microservices (Python, C#/.NET, AWS),
* Relational databases, CI/CD automation (Jenkins, GitHub)
* High code-coverage unit/integration tests
* New prototypes for better user experiences

My development experience involves all aspects of the software lifecycle such as system analysis/design and fast Agile feedback iterations.

For more details about my work, see [Projects and Blog](/blog)
